job_description:
AI Engineer – Internal Tooling & Automation

Location: Kerala (Preference will be given to candidates based in Kerala)

Role Summary:

We are looking for a forward-thinking and passionate AI Engineer to join our Internal Tooling and Automation team. This role is a unique blend of software engineering, automation, and applied artificial intelligence. As an AI Engineer, you will play a key part in designing and building tools that empower operations teams, streamline business processes, and deliver seamless customer support experiences. Unlike conventional engineering roles, this position focuses not only on building scalable systems but also on embedding AI and ML intelligence into those systems to maximize efficiency and reduce manual workload.

You will collaborate with multiple stakeholders across operations, technology, and business functions to understand pain points and identify opportunities for automation. From developing AI-enhanced internal applications to integrating SaaS platforms and deploying ML-driven solutions, your contributions will directly improve the productivity of teams and enhance the customer journey. This is a role for someone who enjoys problem-solving, thrives in dynamic environments, and is eager to apply AI in practical, business-critical scenarios.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Tool Development & Automation: Design, develop, and maintain internal software tools that incorporate automation features. Leverage AI/ML models to address repetitive workflows and enhance tool intelligence.
  • AI-Driven Solutions: Evaluate business processes to identify opportunities where AI/ML models can be deployed to optimize operations, reduce manual intervention, and increase accuracy.
  • Systems Integration: Build and manage integrations with SaaS platforms such as Hubspot, JIRA, and Zendesk using RESTful APIs, GraphQL, and modern web development practices.
  • Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with operations, customer support, and business teams to translate requirements into technical solutions. Provide AI-powered recommendations that improve processes and service delivery.
  • Maintenance & Troubleshooting: Monitor the performance of integrations and automation pipelines, resolving technical issues in a timely manner to ensure minimal business disruption.
  • Documentation: Develop comprehensive documentation for internal tools, integration workflows, and AI/ML models to ensure knowledge sharing and scalability.
  • Continuous Improvement: Research and adopt the latest advancements in AI/ML frameworks, automation practices, and web technologies. Regularly propose enhancements to existing systems and workflows.
  • User Experience Focus: Ensure tools and solutions are intuitive, reliable, and designed to provide maximum ease of use for internal stakeholders.

Knowledge, Skills, and Capabilities:

  • Strong background in core web technologies: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
  • Proven expertise in developing APIs (RESTful & GraphQL).
  • Hands-on experience with backend frameworks such as Express.js (Node.js), Django (Python), or Spring Boot (Java).
  • Proficiency in scripting (Python, Bash) for automation, data handling, and workflow optimization.
  • Familiarity with AI/ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch) and knowledge of deploying models in production environments.
  • Understanding of integrating ML solutions into existing business systems and ensuring real-time performance.
  • Excellent problem-solving abilities, with a detail-oriented and analytical approach.
  • Strong collaboration and communication skills with the ability to interact effectively with diverse teams.
  • Capable of handling multiple projects independently and delivering within deadlines.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience working with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud, especially leveraging their AI/ML services.
  • Experience with APIs specific to Hubspot, Zendesk, or JIRA.
  • Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines, DevOps practices, and ML deployment workflows.
  • Exposure to Natural Language Processing (NLP) for automating text-heavy workflows.
  • Experience in creating dashboards or monitoring tools to track the impact of AI-driven automation.

What We Offer:

  • An opportunity to work on challenging and impactful projects where AI is applied to solve real operational problems.
  • A collaborative and supportive work environment that encourages learning, experimentation, and professional growth.
  • Exposure to modern technologies and platforms in AI, ML, automation, and cloud computing.
  • Career growth opportunities, including mentorship, certifications, and chances to lead projects as you progress.
  • A workplace culture that values innovation, ownership, and continuous improvement.

Why Join Us?

This role is perfect for someone who is excited about the potential of AI and automation to transform the way businesses operate. You will directly contribute to building intelligent systems that make a tangible difference to both employees and customers. If you are a problem-solver at heart, driven by curiosity, and eager to push the boundaries of technology, we invite you to join our team.

Note: Preference will be given to candidates from Kerala.

Employment Type: Full-time Experience Level: Mid-Senior Level Work Experience (years): 4 - 8 Years

Contact: If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at lavanya.a@arttechgroup.com

  6. Sales Operations:

  • Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills.

  • Ability to travel as required.

Benefits:

  • Sales incentives paid on achieving budgetary targets.
  • Comprehensive health and wellness benefits.
  • Opportunities for professional development and career advancement.
  • Dynamic and collaborative work environment.

Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume and a cover letter detailing their relevant experience and why they are a great fit for this role. Please send your application to jobs.in@klystronglobal.com with the subject line "Associate Sales Manager Application".

job_description:
Head of Delivery

Company: InApp Information Technologies India (P) Ltd Location: Trivandrum (Primary) / Kochi (Secondary) Employment Type: Full-time Contact Email: careers@inapp.com Closing Date: 08, Nov 2025 Job Published: 08, Oct 2025

About InApp

InApp is a global software development services provider headquartered in Trivandrum, India, with a growing U.S. presence. We deliver custom applications, enterprise solutions, and digital platforms across industries, combining technical expertise with long-term client partnerships.

Role Overview

We are seeking a Head of Delivery to scale our delivery organization and lead its transformation. The role demands strong governance, operational excellence, and the ability to build future-ready teams that deliver consistent value to global clients.

Key Responsibilities

Delivery Leadership & Strategy - Provide overall leadership and direction to all delivery units across accounts and service lines, overseeing a 450+ member workforce. - Define and implement delivery strategies, frameworks, and processes to achieve predictable, high-quality outcomes. - Establish best-in-class governance mechanisms, project management practices, and delivery KPIs to ensure scalability.

Operational Excellence & Transformation - Drive adoption of automation, engineering efficiency, and AI-enabled practices to enhance delivery productivity. - Standardize and optimize delivery processes across projects to ensure consistency, agility, and scalability. - Enable cross-functional collaboration with Account Management, Technology, and Support teams for seamless client value delivery.

Talent & Capability Development - Build, mentor, and retain a high-performing delivery leadership team capable of driving large-scale programs. - Foster a culture of continuous learning, innovation, and engineering excellence within delivery teams. - Develop future-ready capabilities by aligning talent development with emerging technologies and market needs.

Client Value & Relationship Management - Serve as an executive sponsor for delivery engagements, ensuring proactive governance and timely resolution of escalations. - Collaborate closely with Account Management teams to align delivery excellence with client expectations and long-term partnerships. - Represent the company in client discussions, industry forums, and strategic engagements when required.

Key Requirements

  • Experience: 18+ years in IT services, with at least 5+ years in senior delivery leadership roles.
  • Proven experience in scaling delivery operations in mid-size or fast-growing IT services companies. Candidates from large IT organizations with transformation experience are also encouraged.
  • Strong track record in setting up delivery governance, processes, and frameworks to support growth.
  • Exposure to automation, engineering efficiency, DevOps, and AI/ML adoption in delivery contexts.
  • Experience in managing delivery teams of 400+ professionals across geographies and multiple accounts.
  • Excellent stakeholder management, with the ability to influence C-level executives and global clients.
  • Strong people leadership skills with the ability to build, mentor, and retain top delivery talent.

Competencies & Leadership Traits

  • Strategic thinker with execution excellence.
  • Strong change management and transformation leadership.
  • Customer-centric with a focus on delivery predictability and value creation.
  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, growth-oriented environment.
  • Collaborative leadership style with high accountability and ownership.

What We Offer

  • Opportunity to represent a CMMI Level 5 certified services provider with a global delivery model.
  • An opportunity to shape and scale the delivery organization of a fast-growing IT services company.
  • A leadership role with direct impact on transformation, including processes, governance, and adoption of modern technologies.
  • A collaborative culture that values innovation, ownership, and customer-centricity.
  • Competitive compensation, benefits, and the chance to work closely with the executive leadership team in driving the company’s growth journey.

Preferred Skills: Delivery Leadership & Strategy, Client Value & Relationship Management
summary: Seeking a Head of Delivery to lead and transform a 450+ member IT delivery organization. Role requires strong governance, operational excellence, and talent development for global client value.

job_description:
React Front-End Developer

Company: NeedStreet Web Technologies (P) Ltd Location: Padmanabham, Technopark, Trivandrum , 695581 Website: http://www.continuouscare.io Closing Date: 08, Nov 2025 Job Published: 08, Oct 2025 Contact Email: jobs@needstreet.com

About ContinuousCare

At ContinuousCare.io, we're on a mission to redefine how preventive and digital healthcare is delivered globally. Our platform powers a comprehensive virtual care ecosystem—combining telemedicine, remote patient monitoring, personalized care plans, and AI-first engagement tools—to make quality care accessible, continuous, and truly patient-centred.

We serve providers, hospitals, and insurers across multiple regions, and are rapidly expanding with a strong focus on AI-enhanced experiences, scalable infrastructure, and modern patient engagement strategies.

Role Overview

We are looking for an experienced React Front-End Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for building and maintaining high-performance, user-centric interfaces that power digital health services across the globe. The ideal candidate is passionate about building fast, scalable applications using modern development practices and has a deep understanding of React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

You’ll collaborate closely with our backend, product, and design teams to deliver seamless user experiences that are fast, secure, and AI-powered. Must be willing to work in hybrid mode.

Requirements

Core Skills

  • Strong proficiency in JavaScript and HTML5
  • Expert knowledge of React.js and associated tools:
  • Hooks, Context API, component patterns
  • State management libraries (Redux, Zustand, etc.)
  • Experience with Next.js and server-side rendering
  • Advanced styling skills using Tailwind CSS, SASS, or styled-components
  • Experience building responsive UIs from Figma design specs
  • Deep understanding of performance optimization techniques, including lazy loading, memoization, prefetching, and hydration
  • Working knowledge of WebRTC and real-time connectivity using WebSockets
  • Familiarity with Progressive Web Apps (PWA): offline support, caching strategies, and service workers

Front-End Engineering Practices

  • Semantic HTML and clean UI architecture
  • Strong understanding of security considerations in frontend development (XSS, content sanitization, CSP)
  • Knowledge of i18n implementation and cross-browser compatibility

AI-First Development Practices

As an AI-native platform, we expect developers to be comfortable working with modern AI tooling:

  • Experience using AI-powered IDEs and assistants, such as Cursor, Bolt.new, GitHub Copilot etc
  • Familiarity with Model Context Protocols (MCPs) and their role in customizing LLM behavior in app interfaces
  • Ability to implement AI-powered UI components, such as chat interfaces, smart input fields, summarizers, or assistant panels
  • Use of AI-generated styling suggestions, image generation tools, or layout prototyping
  • Exposure to AI-assisted testing or workflow tools

Testing & QA

  • Strong experience with frontend testing tools such as Jest, React Testing Library, Cypress, or Playwright
  • Ability to debug and profile using browser dev tools and performance monitors
  • Comfortable setting up and maintaining automated testing workflows in CI pipelines

We would be interested to know about

  • Experience working on healthcare-related platforms i.e. familiarity with compliance requirements for HIPAA, GDPR and standard data protection regulations.
  • Awareness of healthcare data standards such as HL7 FHIR, ICD, LOINC etc.
  • Experience with low-bandwidth UX optimization or mobile-first application development
  • Contributions to open-source projects or developer communities focused on modern web development

Why Join Us

  • Work on a mission-driven product in the digital healthcare space
  • Be part of a team that embraces AI-first development practices
  • Build and ship meaningful features that impact real-world healthcare delivery
  • Enjoy a high-ownership, fast-paced environment with growth opportunities
  • Collaborate onsite with experienced engineers, designers, and product leaders in our Trivandrum office.

How to Apply

Send your resume, GitHub/LinkedIn profile, and a short introduction to: jobs@needstreet.com
summary: Seeking a React Front-End Developer with 3+ years of experience for a digital healthcare platform. Responsibilities include building user-centric interfaces with a focus on AI and performance.

job_description:
Node.js Backend Developer

Job Published: 08,Oct 2025 Closing Date: 08,Nov 2025 Contact Email: jobs@needstreet.com

About ContinuousCare

At ContinuousCare.io, we’re building the future of digital healthcare through a unified platform for virtual care, remote patient monitoring, care plans, and AI-powered engagement. Our technology supports patients, doctors, hospitals, insurers, and governments across multiple regions—delivering continuous, accessible, and personalized healthcare experiences.

We're growing rapidly and expanding our AI-first capabilities to transform healthcare delivery and infrastructure. Join us to build systems that not only scale technically but impact lives directly.

Role Overview

We are looking for a highly skilled Node.js Backend Developer to join our team. You’ll take ownership of critical backend services, APIs, and infrastructure that power our patient-provider interactions, AI workflows, and healthcare data systems.

This role is ideal for someone with deep experience in backend architecture, performance optimization, and modern cloud infrastructure—who’s also excited about the possibilities AI brings to system design, workflow automation, and healthcare intelligence. Must be willing to work in hybrid mode.

Requirements

Core Backend Skills

  • Strong proficiency in Node.js and Express.js
  • Expertise in MySQL and Sequelize ORM, including performance tuning, schema design, and migrations
  • Experience with ElasticSearch for full-text search, filtering, and aggregations
  • Proficiency in Redis for caching, session management, and pub/sub
  • Familiarity with RabbitMQ, AWS SQS for async processing and distributed job queues
  • Experience working with WebSockets for real-time services (e.g., notifications, chat, streaming transcripts)
  • Exposure to Next.js API routes and middleware for hybrid applications

Cloud Infrastructure & Performance

  • Solid understanding of AWS services: EC2, RDS, S3, CloudWatch, IAM, SQS/SNS and Lambda
  • Ability to design scalable, modular APIs with clear separation of concerns and robust error handling
  • Strong debugging and profiling skills, including experience with performance bottleneck analysis and monitoring tools
  • Awareness of API rate limiting, authentication/authorization best practices, and RESTful design principles

AI-First Development Practices

As part of an AI-native platform, you'll be expected to collaborate closely on AI-driven features and use AI tools for development and system design.

  • Experience integrating AI workflows and LLM APIs (e.g., OpenAI, Claude, open-source models)
  • Understanding of prompt design, context management, and token optimization
  • Familiarity with RAG pipelines and vector databases like pgvector or Pinecone
  • Experience using Model Context Protocols (MCPs) to enable dynamic AI behavior in response to user/system inputs
  • Proficient in using AI developer tools such as Cursor, Bolt.new, Copilot, or Codeium for development acceleration and refactoring
  • Bonus: Experience with AI-powered observability, log summarization, or error classification tools

Testing & Quality Assurance

  • Strong experience with unit and integration testing frameworks: Jest, Mocha, Supertest, Playwright
  • Familiarity with API testing tools like Postman
  • Experience writing testable and maintainable code, with attention to regression coverage

We would be interested to know about

  • Experience working on healthcare-related platforms i.e. familiarity with compliance requirements for HIPAA, GDPR and standard data protection regulations.
  • Awareness of healthcare data standards such as HL7 FHIR, ICD, LOINC etc.
  • Exposure to microservices, event-driven architecture, or background task queues in production
  • Experience building real-time, low-latency systems, or applications for limited-connectivity environments

Why Join Us

  • Work on a mission-driven platform transforming digital healthcare
  • Be part of a team that builds with AI-first practices and modern cloud-native tooling
  • Contribute to a high-performance architecture supporting users across multiple countries
  • Enjoy a collaborative, in-office development culture in our Trivandrum workspace
  • Build backend systems that directly impact the lives of patients and care teams

How to Apply

Send your resume, GitHub/LinkedIn profile, and a short introduction to: jobs@needstreet.com
summary: Seeking a skilled Node.js Backend Developer with 3+ years experience to build AI-driven healthcare platforms. Must have strong backend, cloud, and AI integration skills.

Company: Waybeo Technology Solutions (P) Ltd Location: Module 15, Fourth Floor, Gayatri Building, Technopark, Trivandrum 6955581 Kerala Website: http://www.waybeo.com Contact Email: aiswarya.cs@waybeo.com Job Published: 08, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 22, Oct 2025

Brief Description

Waybeo is a leading provider of call tracking and ad-generated call intelligence solutions for enterprises, specializing in hyperlocal call tracking and AI-powered lead management solutions. Backed by Airtel, we serve over 22,000 locations across India, empowering marketers with deep call analytics that drive revenue and campaign performance. Our platform is trusted by 56+ enterprise clients, including iconic brands like Royal Enfield, Tata Motors, and Honda Cars. At Waybeo, we focus on turning every phone call into a source of actionable marketing intelligence, helping businesses optimize their ad strategies and customer engagement.

As a Data Verifier, you will be responsible for reviewing and tagging call transcriptions, which will require excellent comprehensive skills in English. This role requires a keen eye for detail, strong linguistic abilities, and the ability to maintain accuracy and consistency in data tagging processes.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Review and verify diverse datasets according to predefined criteria and guidelines.
  • Ensure accuracy and consistency in data tagging processes, paying close attention to linguistic nuances and context.
  • Collaborate with the AI team to optimize tagging strategies and improve efficiency.
  • Provide feedback and contribute to the enhancement of tagging methodologies.
  • Maintain documentation and records related to tagging activities.

Requirements:

  • Excellent command of the English language, including grammar, syntax, and vocabulary.
  • Excellent multilingual command over Hindi + Tamil/Telugu/Kannada/Marathi/Gujarathi languages.
  • Strong attention to detail and ability to maintain consistency in tagging tasks.
  • Previous experience in data tagging or annotation is preferred but not mandatory.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.

Language Proficiency:

  • Hindi (Required)

Work Location:

  • In person

Preferred Skills:

  • Excellent receptive skill in English & Hindi language.
  • Multilingual skill over Kannada, Telugu, or Tamil languages.
  • Proven ability to work with large datasets and meet deadlines.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
summary: Waybeo seeks a Data Verifier to review and tag call transcriptions. Requires strong English and Hindi language skills with attention to detail.

job_description:
Technical Presales Architect

Company: InApp Information Technologies India (P) Ltd Location: Trivandrum (Primary) / Kochi (Secondary) Closing Date: 08, November 2025 Job Published: 08, October 2025 Contact Email: careers@inapp.com

About InApp: InApp is a technology services company headquartered in Trivandrum, Kochi, and the U.S. We specialize in building enterprise-grade software solutions for global clients, helping them accelerate innovation, optimize costs, and scale efficiently. With over 400 engineers, InApp combines deep technical expertise with a strong customer-centric approach.

Role Overview: We are looking for a Technical Presales Architect to join our Presales & Solutioning team. This role focuses on the technical dimension of presales—bridging client needs with InApp’s delivery capabilities. The ideal candidate will work closely with the CRO/Head of Presales, Delivery, and Technology teams to craft high-quality solutions, lead technical discussions with prospects, and support proposal development.

Key Responsibilities:

Solution Design & Architecture:

  • Analyze RFPs/RFIs and client requirements to design optimal technical solutions leveraging InApp’s capabilities.
  • Collaborate with Delivery and Practice Leads to define architecture, technology stacks, and integration strategies.

Technical Engagement with Prospects:

  • Lead deep-dive technical discussions, demos, and workshops with prospects to understand challenges and articulate solutions.
  • Present architectural approaches, frameworks, and design rationale to both technical and business stakeholders.

Proposal Development & Documentation:

  • Contribute to technical sections of proposals, including architecture diagrams, effort estimates, assumptions, and risk mitigation.
  • Support pricing discussions from a technical feasibility and effort standpoint.

Collaboration & Knowledge Sharing:

  • Partner with Sales, Delivery, and Technology teams to ensure alignment between proposed solutions and delivery capabilities.
  • Contribute to reusable solution frameworks, case studies, and accelerators for future opportunities.

Market & Technology Awareness:

  • Stay updated on emerging technologies, tools, and methodologies relevant to InApp’s service offerings.
  • Identify opportunities to incorporate modern technologies (AI, Cloud, Data, DevOps, etc.) in client proposals.

Required Skills & Experience:

Experience:

  • 10–15 years in software architecture, solution design, or technical presales in an IT services environment.

Technical Expertise:

  • Strong knowledge of modern application architectures — Cloud-native, Microservices, APIs, DevOps practices, and CI/CD.
  • Hands-on understanding of at least one major cloud platform (AWS, Azure, or GCP).
  • Familiarity with frontend, backend, and data engineering technologies.

Presales & Communication Skills:

  • Proven ability to engage clients in technical conversations and translate business needs into scalable technical solutions.
  • Strong documentation, presentation, and estimation skills.

Collaborative Mindset:

  • Ability to work cross-functionally with Sales, Delivery, and Leadership teams in a fast-paced environment.
  • Strong analytical thinking, problem-solving, and storytelling abilities.

Preferred Qualifications: - Experience supporting U.S.-based or international clients in presales or solutioning roles. - Exposure to multiple domains such as BFSI, Healthcare, Retail, or Manufacturing. - Certifications in cloud platforms (AWS Solutions Architect, Azure Architect Expert, etc.) are an added advantage.
summary: Seeking a Technical Presales Architect with 10-15 years of experience to design solutions and lead technical discussions. Role involves collaborating with teams to craft high-quality proposals for global clients.

job_description:
DevOps Technical Support Engineer - Junior

Company: REIZEND (P) Ltd Location: Trivandrum (Work From Office) Preferred Candidate Locations: Kerala, Tamil Nadu, and Karnataka Published: 07, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 21, Nov 2025 Contact Email: careers@reizend.ai Website: http://www.reizendretail.in

Brief Description

We are looking for a proactive & highly skilled Technical Support Engineer to provide exceptional technical support to overseas projects, working in rotational shifts to ensure 24/7 availability. This role involves troubleshooting complex issues across cloud platforms, networking, application architectures, and DevOps toolchains. The ideal candidate should be self-motivated, a collaborator, agile, and a continuous learner.

Key Responsibilities

  • Provide technical support and troubleshoot issues related to cloud platforms and services such as Fargate, ECS, DynamoDB, BigQuery, SNS etc.
  • Understand problems by consuming logs and metrics from various sources using services such as CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, Loki, Alert Managers, and Splunk etc.
  • Analyze and resolve networking challenges, including load balancers, API gateways, reverse proxies, ingress controllers, and service-to-service communications.
  • Work on issues related to client-server communications, firewalls, and virtual machines.
  • Collaborate with DevOps teams to manage and troubleshoot toolchains like Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Ingress Controllers etc.
  • Act as the first point of contact for technical queries and escalate issues when necessary.
  • Liaise with development and operations teams to identify root causes and resolve incidents effectively.
  • Document troubleshooting steps, solutions, and maintain a knowledge base for recurring issues.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement best practices for monitoring and incident response.
  • Participate in shift handovers and provide timely updates on ongoing issues.

Preferred Skills

Cloud Platforms and Services

  • Hands-on knowledge working with Fargate and ECS for managing and troubleshooting containerized workloads.
  • Proficiency with DynamoDB and BigQuery for analyzing data and making decisions based on the analysis.
  • Hands-on knowledge of SNS for debugging message delivery issues and integration workflows.

Monitoring and Logging Tools

  • Proficiency in CloudWatch Logs, Loki, and Splunk for consuming and analyzing logs to identify and resolve issues.
  • Hands-on knowledge with Prometheus and Grafana for analyzing metrics using dashboards and monitoring system health.
  • Knowledge of Alert Manager for configuring and managing alert escalation.
  • Ability to interpret metrics from various sources and create actionable insights.

Networking and Security

  • Understanding of load balancers (e.g., ALB, NLB) for distributing traffic and troubleshooting connectivity issues.
  • Knowledge in API Gateways like AWS API Gateway or NGINX for managing API traffic.
  • Knowledge of reverse proxies and ingress controllers (e.g., NGINX Ingress, Traefik) for managing internal/external traffic.
  • Understanding of service-to-service communications, including DNS, HTTP/HTTPS, and gRPC protocols.
  • Hands-on knowledge with firewalls, security groups, and IAM roles for secure communications.
  • Troubleshooting skills for VM-related issues in platforms like AWS EC2 or equivalent.

DevOps Toolchains

  • Proficiency with Docker for managing container images and runtime debugging.
  • Understanding of Kubernetes concepts of managing deployments, ingress setups, and pod-related issues and related troubleshooting commands and mechanisms.
  • Knowledge of CI/CD pipeline building tools such as Jenkins, GitHub Actions, ArgoCD for building, deploying, and managing automated pipelines.
  • Understanding of Ingress controllers (e.g., NGINX, Traefik) and SSL termination for secure routing.

Troubleshooting and Incident Management

  • Strong problem-solving skills to identify root causes using logs, metrics, and system-level debugging.
  • Ability to document detailed troubleshooting steps and solutions for recurring issues.

Collaboration and Communication

  • Ability to work with cross-functional teams (DevOps, development, and operations) to resolve incidents.
  • Skills in effective and proactive communication to escalate issues and provide updates during shift handovers.
  • Proficiency with tools like Slack, JIRA, Confluence, or Google Workspace for collaboration and issue tracking.

Salary Package

  • 4 - 6 LPA

Experience: 0.5 - 2 years

Address: SBC Module 15, -2 Floor, Thejaswini Building, Technopark phase 1, Trivandrum, 695581
summary: Seeking a junior DevOps Technical Support Engineer with 0.5-2 years experience. Provide 24/7 support for overseas projects, troubleshooting cloud and DevOps toolchain issues.

Key Responsibilities: As a Graduate Product Engineer, you will: - Participate in a 12-month structured training program. - Engage in technical sessions and receive mentorship from Arbor’s Engineering Leads. - Apply learned skills in real-world projects under supervision. - Rotate through product engineering, QA, and DevOps to gain end-to-end skills. - Complete coding modules, assessments, and team projects. - Actively seek feedback, embrace continuous learning, and contribute to a collaborative team environment. - Demonstrate commitment to program expectations for a potential transition to a permanent role.

Benefits: - Accelerated Growth: Fast-track your career with unparalleled learning and development opportunities. - Competitive Rewards: Receive a highly competitive salary reflecting your talent and potential. - Comprehensive Benefits: Includes Group Term Life Insurance (3x Annual CTC). - Generous Time Off: Enjoy 32 days of holiday annually (25 annual leave + 7 company-wide days). - Work-Life Balance: Maintain a consistent schedule from 9:30 AM to 6:00 PM. - Exciting Recognition Programs: Celebrate successes with robust recognition and reward initiatives.

Eligibility Criteria: - Courses & Discipline: Full-time B.Tech (IT/CSE), BCA, B.Sc (IT, Computer Science) graduates from 2024 and 2025 batches. - Percentage: Minimum 70% aggregate or equivalent CGPA, including successful completion of the final year/semester. - Backlogs: Up to 1 pending or active backlog/arrear permitted at the interview stage; must be cleared within the course duration. - Academic Gap: Maximum 24 months overall academic gap; must be declared with documentary proof. - Course Type: Only full-time courses are considered. - Work Experience: This is an entry-level role. Prior work experience must be declared and supported by documentation.

Important Note: Stringent eligibility criteria and a robust selection process are in place. Eligibility will be verified at multiple stages. Background checks (education, employment, criminal records) will be conducted by a third-party agency. Discrepancies may lead to disqualification.

Company Address: 3rd FLOOR, M SQUARED BUILDING, ANNEX 1, TECHNOPARK CAMPUS, KARYAVATTOM, TRIVANDRUM, KERALA, 695581

Contact Email: hr.india@arbor-education.com

job_description:
DevOps Technical Support Engineer

Company: REIZEND (P) Ltd Location: SBC Module 15, 2nd Floor, Thejaswini Building, Technopark phase 1, Trivandrum, 695581 Website: http://www.reizendretail.in

Job Published: 07, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 21, Nov 2025 Contact Email: careers@reizend.ai

Experience: 0.5 - 2 Years Salary Package: 4 - 6 LPA Work Type: Work From Office

Brief Description

We are looking for a proactive & highly skilled Technical Support Engineer to provide exceptional technical support to overseas projects, working in rotational shifts to ensure 24/7 availability. This role involves troubleshooting complex issues across cloud platforms, networking, application architectures, and DevOps toolchains. The ideal candidate should be self-motivated, a collaborator, agile, and a continuous learner.

Key Responsibilities

  • Provide technical support and troubleshoot issues related to cloud platforms and services such as Fargate, ECS, DynamoDB, BigQuery, SNS etc.
  • Understand problems by consuming logs and metrics from various sources using services such as CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, Loki, Alert Managers, and Splunk etc.
  • Analyze and resolve networking challenges, including load balancers, API gateways, reverse proxies, ingress controllers, and service-to-service communications.
  • Work on issues related to client-server communications, firewalls, and virtual machines.
  • Collaborate with DevOps teams to manage and troubleshoot toolchains like Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Ingress Controllers etc.
  • Act as the first point of contact for technical queries and escalate issues when necessary.
  • Liaise with development and operations teams to identify root causes and resolve incidents effectively.
  • Document troubleshooting steps, solutions, and maintain a knowledge base for recurring issues.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement best practices for monitoring and incident response.
  • Participate in shift handovers and provide timely updates on ongoing issues.

Preferred Skills

Cloud Platforms and Services: - Hands-on knowledge working with Fargate and ECS for managing and troubleshooting containerized workloads. - Proficiency with DynamoDB and BigQuery for analyzing data and making informed decisions. - Hands-on knowledge of SNS for debugging message delivery issues and integration workflows.

Monitoring and Logging Tools: - Proficiency in CloudWatch Logs, Loki, and Splunk for consuming and analyzing logs to identify and resolve issues. - Hands-on knowledge with Prometheus and Grafana for analyzing metrics using dashboards and monitoring system health. - Knowledge of Alert Manager for configuring and managing alert escalation. - Ability to interpret metrics from various sources and create actionable insights.

Networking and Security: - Understanding of load balancers (e.g., ALB, NLB) for distributing traffic and troubleshooting connectivity issues. - Knowledge in API Gateways like AWS API Gateway or NGINX for managing API traffic. - Knowledge of reverse proxies and ingress controllers (e.g., NGINX Ingress, Traefik) for managing internal/external traffic. - Understanding service-to-service communications, including DNS, HTTP/HTTPS, and gRPC protocols. - Hands-on knowledge with firewalls, security groups, and IAM roles for secure communications. - Troubleshooting skills for VM-related issues in platforms like AWS EC2 or equivalent.

DevOps Toolchains: - Proficiency with Docker for managing container images and runtime debugging. - Understanding of Kubernetes concepts for managing deployments, ingress setups, and pod-related issues, along with related troubleshooting commands and mechanisms. - Knowledge of CI/CD pipeline building tools such as Jenkins, GitHub Actions, ArgoCD for building, deploying, and managing automated pipelines. - Understanding of Ingress controllers (e.g., NGINX, Traefik) and SSL termination for secure routing.

Troubleshooting and Incident Management: - Strong problem-solving skills to identify root causes using logs, metrics, and system-level debugging. - Ability to document detailed troubleshooting steps and solutions for recurring issues.

Collaboration and Communication: - Ability to work with cross-functional teams (DevOps, development, and operations) to resolve incidents. - Skills in effective and proactive communication to escalate issues and provide updates during shift handovers. - Proficiency with tools like Slack, JIRA, Confluence, or Google Workspace for collaboration and issue tracking.
summary: Seeking a DevOps Technical Support Engineer with 0.5-2 years of experience to troubleshoot overseas projects. Role involves resolving complex issues across cloud, networking, and DevOps toolchains in rotational shifts.
